summary: This adds a new player home which can be accessed in Whiterun. It contains all of the basic necessities with a few perks. The design of this home is to stay basic and not be over-the-top. Many updates are planned. This project will be worked on frequently.
descriptionHtml:
This adds a new player home which can be accessed in Whiterun. It contains all of the basic necessities with a few perks. The home has everything you need. It has Alchemy and Enchanting tables, labeled storage chests for easy organization, and Blacksmithing necessities. The home also has every shrine and standing stone available. There is currently a merchant that will be available 24/7 and buys/sells everything. The design of this home is to stay basic and not be over-the-top. Many updates are planned. This project will be worked on frequently.


Updates Planned

1. Finish study room with working bookshelves
2. Add more decorations
3. Work on player requests
5. And more


Add me on Steam at http://bit.ly/UNQBex
author: Ganaray

files.name: Dragonborn Hideout 1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Whiterun Door
Fixed gap in floor
Added more weapon racks
Added Book of Donators
Added more weapon plaques
Adjusted rotation of Riften hatch
Moved location player appears when going to Riften
Fixed some chandeliers not being in the correct position
Added some tomatoes and cheese to the rack in Keer-Za's room
